properties.name: baas.rest.endpoint
properties.description: 区块链 REST API 服务地址.

properties.name: baas.rest.refresh_token
properties.description: 在区块链控制台生成的 refresh token.

properties.name: baas.rest.network_name
properties.description: 区块链网络名称（Fabric 通道名称）.

properties.name: baas.rest.contract_name
properties.description: 区块链智能合约名称（Fabric 链码名称）.
